title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 60 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 60 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O God, thou hast cast us off, thou hast scattered us, thou hast been displeased; O turn thyself to us again.
lineList.cn: （大卫与两河间的亚兰并琐巴的亚兰争战的时候，约押转回，在盐谷攻击以东，杀了一万二千人。那时大卫作这金诗，叫人学习，交与伶长，调用为证的百合花）神阿，你丢弃了我们，使我们破坏；你向我们发怒，求你使我们复兴。

lineList.en: Thou hast made the earth to tremble; thou hast broken it: heal the breaches thereof; for it shaketh.
lineList.cn: 你使地震动，而且崩裂。求你将裂口医好。因为地摇动。

lineList.en: Thou hast shewed thy people hard things: thou hast made us to drink the wine of astonishment.
lineList.cn: 你叫你的民遇见艰难。你叫我们喝那使人东倒西歪的酒。

lineList.en: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.
lineList.cn: 你把旌旗赐给敬畏你的人，可以为真理杨起来。（细拉）

lineList.en: That thy beloved may be delivered; save with thy right hand, and hear me.
lineList.cn: 求你应允我们，用右手拯救我们，好叫你所亲爱的人得救。

lineList.en: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.
lineList.cn: 神已经指着他的圣洁说，（说或作应许我）我要欢乐。我要分开示剑，丈量疏割谷。

lineList.en: Gilead is mine, and Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;
lineList.cn: 基列是我的。玛拿西也是我的。以法莲是护卫我头的。犹大是我的杖。

lineList.en: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe: Philistia, triumph thou because of me.
lineList.cn: 摩押是我的沭浴盆。我要向以东抛鞋。非利士阿，你还能因我欢呼吗。

lineList.en: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?
lineList.cn: 谁能领我进坚固城。谁能引我到以东地。

lineList.en: Wilt not thou, O God, which hadst cast us off? and thou, O God, which didst not go out with our armies?
lineList.cn: 神阿，你不是丢弃了我们吗。神阿，你不和我们的军兵同去吗。

lineList.en: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.
lineList.cn: 求你帮助我们攻击敌人，因为人的帮助是枉然的。

lineList.en: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.
lineList.cn: 我们倚靠神，才得施展大能，因为践踏我们敌人的就是他。
